full_summary:
--------------------------------

**Tender Announcement: Petroleum Products, Oils, and Lubricants**

**Reference Number:** WS4046099355-Doc4053760193
**Solicitation Number:** WS4046099355
**Publication Date:** 2023-06-30
**Closing Date:** 2023-08-08T14:00:00
**Modification Date:** 2023-07-31

**Procurement Details:**
The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) invites bids from qualified suppliers for a Regional Individual Standing Offer (RISO) to supply, deliver, and offload Petroleum products, Oils, and Lubricants (POL) to the Department of National Defence, Canadian Forces Base Moose Jaw, 431 (AD) Squadron, 15 Wing Moose jaw, Saskatchewan.

**Scope of Work:**
The RISO is for the supply of POL on an "as and when required" basis during the Standing Offer period. The successful bidder will be responsible for delivering and offloading POL at the specified location.

**Trade Agreements:**
This procurement is subject to the World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA) and various free trade agreements, including the Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA) and the Canada-Ukraine Free Trade Agreement (CUFTA).

**Selection Criteria:**
The lowest price will be the primary selection criterion for this procurement.

**Tender Requirements:**
To access the tender documents and submit a bid, please visit the Ariba Discovery website at: http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/16740903?extsite=MTY3NDA5MDNfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==.

**Contact Information:**
For questions or concerns, please contact Tanya Gostev, Procurement Officer, at tanya.gostev@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca.

---------------------------------

**Cancellation Notice:**
Note that this tender has been cancelled as indicated by the Tender Status: "Annulé" in French and "Cancelled" in English.
